author: Paul
content:
I hadn't heard much buzz about LR5, but it's good that you're getting some good use out of it. I've been looking, casually, at the list of issues, some seem kind of major, like losing sharpening on export; It's been a very quiet release. I've not upgraded yet, but I can certainly say that just the ability to remove odd shaped items would be worth the upgrade!

Lovely photo!
